languages.text: "Ваши дворяне весьма разбалованы отсутствием соглядатаев. Только за сегодня я краем уха услышал три высказывания, которые при должном рвении можно было бы превратить в повод для обвинения в ереси".

"The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."
languages.original_text: "Ваши дворяне весьма разбалованы отсутствием соглядатаев. Только за сегодня я краем уха услышал три высказывания, которые при должном рвении можно было бы превратить в повод для обвинения в ереси".

traits.locale_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

"The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

"The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

languages.text: “这个世界没有监察官，你的贵族变得极其狂妄自大。光是今天，我就无意中听到了三句亵渎性的话。如果我愿意的话，甚至可以把这些话作为指控异端的证据。”
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界没有监察官，你的贵族变得极其狂妄自大。光是今天，我就无意中听到了三句亵渎性的话。如果我愿意的话，甚至可以把这些话作为指控异端的证据。”

languages.text: «La falta de observadores en este mundo ha llevado a que sus nobles se vuelvan extremadamente autocomplacientes. Hoy mismo he oído tres declaraciones que, si quisiera, podría convertir en pruebas para acusaciones de herejía».
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: «La falta de observadores en este mundo ha llevado a que sus nobles se vuelvan extremadamente autocomplacientes. Hoy mismo he oído tres declaraciones que, si quisiera, podría convertir en pruebas para acusaciones de herejía».

languages.text: 「この星は監視員が不足しており、貴族階級の人間はひどい自己満足に陥っている。今日だけでも、そんな発言を3件聞いた。私がその気になれば異端の罪に問える」
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「この星は監視員が不足しており、貴族階級の人間はひどい自己満足に陥っている。今日だけでも、そんな発言を3件聞いた。私がその気になれば異端の罪に問える」

languages.text: "Durch die fehlenden Beobachter auf dieser Welt sind Eure Adligen extrem selbstzufrieden geworden. Allein heute habe ich drei Aussagen gehört, die Grund zu einer Anklage wegen Ketzerei gäben, wenn ich das wollte."
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Durch die fehlenden Beobachter auf dieser Welt sind Eure Adligen extrem selbstzufrieden geworden. Allein heute habe ich drei Aussagen gehört, die Grund zu einer Anklage wegen Ketzerei gäben, wenn ich das wollte."

languages.text: « L'absence d'observateurs sur ce monde a poussé la noblesse à prendre un peu trop ses aises. Rien qu'aujourd'hui, j'ai entendu trois déclarations qui pourraient faire l'objet d'une accusation pour hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: « L'absence d'observateurs sur ce monde a poussé la noblesse à prendre un peu trop ses aises. Rien qu'aujourd'hui, j'ai entendu trois déclarations qui pourraient faire l'objet d'une accusation pour hérésie. »

languages.text: "Gözlemci eksikliğini fırsat bilen bu dünyanın soyluları, laubaliliği kendilerine hak görür olmuş. İstesem daha bugün kulak misafiri olduğum laflar yüzünden üç kişiyi kâfirlikle suçlayabilirdim."
languages.original_text: "The lack of observers on this world has led your nobles to become extremely complacent. Today alone, I overheard three statements that, if I so wanted, could be turned into grounds for a charge of heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Gözleyen kimse olmadığı için bu dünyanın soyluları son derece laubali bir hâl almış. İsteseydim, daha bugün kulak misafiri olduğum laflar yüzünden üç kişiyi kâfirlikle suçlayabilirdim."
